venue.address_1: side road off the north side of Rt 2
venue.name: Starr King Trailhead

item.description:
We will meet at parking lot just to the right of intersection of Rt. 2 and Rt. 115A in Jefferson, NH. The trail starts almost directly across from the parking lot. It is one of the easier 4000 footers to hike. It is 7.2 miles roundtrip. Read AMC book description for more details. You will need to bring snowshoes, and either microspikes or crampons in case there is a lot of ice. It's a lovely hike through the woods.

We will promptly at 8:15am. I'm driving a silver Subaru Legacy. I hike on the slower side but people can hike whatever speed they want, as long as we touch base periodically.


The hike is closed to new RSVP's, at 13 people. For those who said Yes, please make sure you are still comimg to the hike.
item.how_to_find_us: Winter parking across from the trailhead. Note: food and restroom at the country store
item.name: Mt. Waumbek via Starr King Trail
